original_text: Now while Paul waited for them at Athens, his spirit was stirred in him, when he saw the city wholly given to idolatry.
korean_text: 바울이 아덴에서 그들을 기다리다가 그 성에 우상이 가득한 것을 보고 마음에 격분하여

sentences.original_text: Now while Paul waited for them at Athens
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 바울이 아테네에서 그들을 기다리는 동안

sentences.original_text: his spirit was stirred in him
